quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: It's not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injustice.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.
